<h3 style="margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;">Details</h3>
<p align="justify">
This dataset extends on the AVHRR-based VCF dataset developed by Hansen et al. (2016), complementing the last years of the time-series (2017-2019) by integrating MODIS VCF data. Here, we used a Random Forest (RF) model to translate the MODIS VCF data into a AVHRR-like values, and derive a contiguous time-series.
</p>
